username,

salary,

mapper.update:
update user_mybatishelper
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth = #{birth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from user_mybatishelper where userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and username > #{minUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and username < #{maxUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by salary desc, userid desc limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from user_mybatishelper where username=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
